last_episode_to_air.name: About a Homecoming
last_episode_to_air.overview: The guys' old roommate returns and it worries Amy. She's concerned about her place among the guys.

name: About a Girl
overview: About a Girl is a Canadian comedy series which premiered on October 5, 2007 on Noggin's nighttime block, The N. In Canada, it aired on Global. It was the first scripted comedy for The N. The series ended with 13 episodes in its only season.

episodes.name: About a Pilot
episodes.overview: Finally on her own, college sophomore Amy Ryan passes up sorority life to share a house with four guys.

episodes.name: About the Rules
episodes.overview: When things get to out of hand, Amy decides its time to make house rules for the guys.

episodes.name: About a Job
episodes.overview: Amy enjoys her job at the campus bookstore but that all changes when her boss becomes romantically interested in her.

episodes.name: About a Flood
episodes.overview: After Stacy's sorority house floods, she stays with Amy and the guys.

episodes.name: About a Break-Up
episodes.overview: Amy turns to the guys for support after her new boyfriend lets her down.

episodes.name: About a Visit
episodes.overview: When Amy's mom unexpectedly visits, it spells trouble for her time remaining in the house.

episodes.name: About a Dream
episodes.overview: On the eve of the campus chili-cookout, Amy has a sexy dream about Jason.

episodes.name: About a Prank War
episodes.overview: Amy has to fight back when the guys pull a prank on her.

episodes.name: About an F-Word
episodes.overview: When Amy fails her marine-biology exam, she asks the guys what she should do. After following their advice, she has a major blow up in front of her class. Now Amy must decide if marine-biology is really her lifes passion.

episodes.name: About an All-Niter
episodes.overview: Amy takes the guys to the library for an all night study session. Her plan heads south, however, when the guys start pining over girls at the library.

episodes.name: About a Boot
episodes.overview: The guys help Amy with her unpaid parking tickets while Benny undergoes a makeover for Erin.

episodes.name: About a Tent
episodes.overview: The guys goes on a weekend camping trip with Amy and her best friend Erin. The only problem: there's only one tent.

episodes.name: About a Homecoming
episodes.overview: The guys' old roommate returns and it worries Amy. She's concerned about her place among the guys.
